msdf-atlas-gen
==============
1) Grab the source code from github: https://github.com/Chlumsky/msdf-atlas-gen
2) Extract to \vendor\msdf-atlas-gen\msdf-atlas-gen-master
3) atlas-gen depends on msdf-gen, get it from: https://github.com/Chlumsky/msdfgen (or vcpkg)
3) Extract to \vendor\msdf-atlas-gen\msdf-gen-master
4) Grab the code example from README.md on the github page and paste at the appropriate place in source
   ( my example: primitives.cpp Fonts::createFont() )
5)
